title: Can't even play LoL anymore
body:
I can't open lol at all, i launch as admin, the lol icon appears, disappears, then reappears with the loading bar, after it loads
the patcher never shows up. And i got mad, so i went into task manager. When i look in task manager, it does what
i said, but it kills itself! WTF?!?

 I deleted the whole game and tried to re install, but that wouldn't work.
i basically just deleted my whole lol, tried to reinstall but i still couldn't even get to the patcher/client screen.
God help me {{item:3070}} 
it's been working fine since a couple of days ago. What did i do?!?

replies.body:
>Ha, i knew noone would comment. Like every other damn help thread i make

That's just because this specific board encourages people not to reply to others. If you wait enough, eventually I come around, and I reply to all applicable posts made here.

I'll presume you're on Windows, because you mentioned "task manager".

Scan your computer for malicious softwares such as viruses or malware. Then, try cleaning your registry with something like CCleaner.

Make sure all of your drivers and operating systems are completely updated. If possible, avoid using Windows Update to update your graphics, as usually they store outdated drivers on their servers.

If it's still not working, try [flushing your DNS/IP](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq10), and then [try an alternative DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) (which you'll have to flush again afterward, and have to reset your computer).

If it's *still* not working, reply to this message and get back to me.

Best of luck.
Ha, i knew noone would comment. Like every other damn help thread i make
